name: Guild Wars 2
description: This is a special build based on GW2 player ArmoredVehicle's custom WINE build that is uploaded to the Guild Wars 2 Forums: https://en-forum.guildwars2.com/discussion/31192/playing-guild-wars-2-on-linux-performance-optimizations-and-more/p1An SSD is strongly recommended for improved performance.
notes: For AMD/Intel users, please use the Armored Mesa installer as this one is NVidia specific.
content:
files:
- client: https://s3.amazonaws.com/gw2cdn/client/branches/Gw2Setup-64.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: -maploadinfo
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Guild Wars 2/GW2-64.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating win64 prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Guild Wars 2"
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Guild Wars 2/GW2-64.exe
    src: client
system:
  disable_compositor: 'true'
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    LD_PRELOAD: libpthread.so.0 libGL.so.1
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    WINEARCH: wine64
    WINEDEBUG: -all
    __GL_DEFAULT_LOG_ANISO: 0
    __GL_FSAA_MODE: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_SKIP_CLEANUP: 1
    __GL_SYNC_TO_VBLANK: 0
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    __GL_YIELD: NOTHING
    __NV_PRIME_RENDER_OFFLOAD: 1
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
